  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.util.Date birthdate, PersonalInfo.Sex sex) throws EmailException, PasswordException, UserNameException
      Checks each param before the user add to users
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of user
      lastName - last name of user
      userName - user name of user
      email - email address of user
      password - password of user
      birthdate - birthdate of user
      sex - sex of user
      Throws:
      EmailException - throws exception when email string misses an @ character
      PasswordException - throws exception when the password string is in conflict with the following constraints: Minimum eight characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
      UserNameException - throws exception when the length of the user name is less then 5

    • activeUsers

      public java.util.ArrayList<User> activeUsers()
      Iterates the users array and put every active user in a new list
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all activeUser

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser​(User userToDelete)

      Parameters:
      userToDelete - user that should be delete

    • changeEmail

      public void changeEmail​(User user, java.lang.String newEmail)
      Checks the email address is valid or already taken and set the new email address of the user
      Parameters:
      user - user that email address should be change
      newEmail - new email address
